plain_text:
--- PAGE 1 ---
List of categories where trials are allowed:
 Simulators
 Ship's propulsion machinery, radars and sensors, naviga(cid:415)on equipment, communica(cid:415)on equipment, RO
plants, compressors, cranes, boats, Pilotless Target aircra(cid:332), pumps, dehumidifiers etc.
 Aircra(cid:332) engine/generator/flight deck equipment/air condi(cid:415)oning system/radars
 Tank engine/ generator/ air condi(cid:415)oning system
 Bullet Proof Helmet, Bullet Resistance Jacket
 Drones
 All-Terrain Vehicles (ATV)
 Communica(cid:415)on Equipment for Defense:
Radio Sets:
o HF/VHF/FM Manpack Radio
o Vehicle Radio Set
Tac(cid:415)cal Communica(cid:415)on Systems:
o So(cid:332)ware Defined Radio (SDR) Systems
o VHF/UHF Tac(cid:415)cal Communica(cid:415)on Systems
o Handheld Satellite Phones (e.g., Iridium)
o Combat Net Radio (CNR) Systems
Satellite Communica(cid:415)on Systems:
o Very Small Aperture Terminal (VSAT) Systems
o Satellite Phones
o Mobile Satellite Communica(cid:415)on Systems
Command and Control Systems:
o Ba(cid:425)lefield Management Systems (BMS)
o Tac(cid:415)cal Data Links
o Encryp(cid:415)on Devices (e.g., VINBAX)
o Surveillance and Reconnaissance Communica(cid:415)on:
o Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) Communica(cid:415)on Systems
o Ground Control Sta(cid:415)ons (GCS) for UAVs
o Remote Video Terminals (RVTs)
Electronic Warfare (EW) Communica(cid:415)on:
o EW Communica(cid:415)on Jamming Systems
o Communica(cid:415)on Intelligence (COMINT) Systems
Network Infrastructure:
o Field Deployable Communica(cid:415)on Nodes
o Tac(cid:415)cal Communica(cid:415)on Switches
o Mobile Communica(cid:415)on Shelters
Naviga(cid:415)on and Posi(cid:415)oning Systems:
o GPS Receivers
o Naviga(cid:415)on Systems for Vehicles and Personnel
Specialized Communica(cid:415)on Equipment:
o Underwater Communica(cid:415)on Systems
o Special Forces Communica(cid:415)on Gear
o Mountain Warfare Communica(cid:415)on Equipment
 Contamina(cid:415)on Monitor

--- PAGE 2 ---
 Fiber Reinforced Plas(cid:415)c Boat with Motor (RIBs)
 Bukhari Improved Version
 Fire Figh(cid:415)ng Equipment's as per DGQA specifica(cid:415)ons
 Vic(cid:415)m Loca(cid:415)on System with Breaching System
 HDPE Boats
 Pontoon Boats
 Medical equipment
 Engineering and Mining Equipment for Bomb Disposal Units:
 Modular protec(cid:415)on vehicles
 High Al(cid:415)tude Clothing including Snow Boots

headings: List of categories where trials are allowed
bullets: Simulators
Ship's propulsion machinery, radars and sensors, navigation equipment, communication equipment, RO plants, compressors, cranes, boats, Pilotless Target aircraft, pumps, dehumidifiers etc.
Aircraft engine/generator/flight deck equipment/air conditioning system/radars
Tank engine/ generator/ air conditioning system
Bullet Proof Helmet, Bullet Resistance Jacket
Drones
All-Terrain Vehicles (ATV)
Communication Equipment for Defense:
Radio Sets: HF/VHF/FM Manpack Radio, Vehicle Radio Set
Tactical Communication Systems: Software Defined Radio (SDR) Systems, VHF/UHF Tactical Communication Systems, Handheld Satellite Phones (e.g., Iridium), Combat Net Radio (CNR) Systems
Satellite Communication Systems: Very Small Aperture Terminal (VSAT) Systems, Satellite Phones, Mobile Satellite Communication Systems
Command and Control Systems: Battlefield Management Systems (BMS), Tactical Data Links, Encryption Devices (e.g., VINBAX)
Surveillance and Reconnaissance Communication: Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) Communication Systems, Ground Control Stations (GCS) for UAVs, Remote Video Terminals (RVTs)
Electronic Warfare (EW) Communication: EW Communication Jamming Systems, Communication Intelligence (COMINT) Systems
Network Infrastructure: Field Deployable Communication Nodes, Tactical Communication Switches, Mobile Communication Shelters
Navigation and Positioning Systems: GPS Receivers, Navigation Systems for Vehicles and Personnel
Specialized Communication Equipment: Underwater Communication Systems, Special Forces Communication Gear, Mountain Warfare Communication Equipment
Contamination Monitor
Fiber Reinforced Plastic Boat with Motor (RIBs)
Bukhari Improved Version
Fire Fighting Equipment's as per DGQA specifications
Victim Location System with Breaching System
HDPE Boats
Pontoon Boats
Medical equipment
Engineering and Mining Equipment for Bomb Disposal Units
Modular protection vehicles
High Altitude Clothing including Snow Boots
ai_summary.summary: The document lists various categories of equipment and systems eligible for trials, primarily for defense and related applications. These include simulators, vehicles, communication and navigation systems, protective gear, drones, boats, medical and engineering equipment, and specialized tools for high-altitude and bomb disposal operations.
